page.title: 10CEMETERY AND CREMATORIUM.
page.content: Pleasington{cemetery}was opened in{ {1943,}the{crematorium}in{1956}.This is set in{25 acres}of land with more land available for expansion.The cemetery has a special{section for muslims}.All muslim graves contain one body and they all face Mecca.Muslims bodies are wrapped in{Muslin}without coffins.The mourners fill the graves with soil themselves.A Muslim must be buried within 24 hours.A seperate section for poles and Ukrainians is nearly full. There are on average{1500 cremations and{340 burials}per year.There is {11} {staff-} 2 gravediggers,2 who work in the crematorium and 7 gardeners. At a cremation the coffin is put on a{catafalque.}After the service it is placed in an{oven}and stays there till destroyed.The remains are pulverised and either given to relatives or scattered in the cemetery grounds.
